entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
